text: Hajace mahine nirdharita aheta. Yastava jo ya tharavika divasata hajaca pakka irada karila tara tyane apalya patnisi sambhoga karanyapasuna, aparadha karanyapasuna ani bhandana-tanta karanyapasuna dura rahave. Tumhi je savaba (punya) ce kama karala, te sarvasrestha allaha jananara ahe, ani apalyasobata pravasakharca (sadhana-samagri) avasya ghya. Sarvanta uttama asa pravasakharca tara allahace bhaya ahe. Ani he bud'dhimanano! Majhe bhaya balagata raha
